1.10.2.1.1.0:
- The damage and health boost of mobs inside The Beneath should no longer spiral out of control and reach 5 digit numbers
- Added a config option that allows you to stop mob spawning inside The Beneath
- Added a config option for the Spawn Weight of the Shadows.
- Grue is no longer required (but the mode will switch to darkness if set to grue while Grue isn't installed)
- Now runs on Forge 12.18.3.2185
